name: Unreal Heist
description:
As secret agent Games Fond, you must infiltrate the jungle manor and retrieve a 1.3 trillion dollar golden monkey statue.

The problem is, the mastermind defending the manor has implemented hologram decoys, meaning that all but one of the statues are not real.

Luckily, Mr. E has lended you some Legitimate Shades, which help you see what's actually real. By wearing them, you will see the world as it truly is.

There are lots of guards and traps throughout the place, and those too may be holograms. Check everything through your shades to know your surroundings.

Good Luck, Agent Fond. We're counting on you.

CONTROLS

WASD - Move

MOUSE - Look

SHIFT - Sneak 

SPACE - Jump

ESCAPE - Quit to Menu

This game was made in 7 Days by one person for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1.

The theme for the jam is "It is Not Real"

Have fun!

 - DelugeDrop
